title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine business intelligence with Amazon Quick Sight (BIZ228)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon QuickSight 重新构想商业智能 (BIZ228)
abstract: Enterprises are transforming with AI-powered BI from Quick Sight, turning scattered data into strategic action. Watch as we demonstrate how Quick Sight eliminates barriers to data-driven decision making using AI agents, allowing everyone to uncover critical insights and achieve better business outcomes. Hear from Intuit as they share how they transformed their analytics capabilities with Quick Sight—helping users perform advanced data analysis and analyze both structured and unstructured data using AI. Discover how Intuit is democratizing insights across their organization, analyzing massive high-velocity data sets efficiently, and achieving scalability, all without managing infrastructure.
abstract_cn: 企业正在通过 Quick Sight 的 AI 驱动型商业智能进行转型，将分散的数据转化为战略行动。观看我们演示 Quick Sight 如何使用 AI 代理消除数据驱动决策的障碍，让每个人都能发现关键洞察并实现更好的业务成果。聆听 Intuit 分享他们如何通过 Quick Sight 转变其分析能力——帮助用户执行高级数据分析，并使用 AI 分析结构化和非结构化数据。了解 Intuit 如何在整个组织中实现洞察民主化，高效分析海量高速数据集，并实现可扩展性，而无需管理基础设施。

presenter.name: NEAL CAULEY
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader Amazon Quick Suite
